RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PHARIBE was away alertly and quickly made the lead, was well handled on the front end, led throughout and remained clear late under strong handling. PLAYFUL SUMMER gad good position on the inside, dropped back on the far turn, angled out five wide in the stretch and came again. SUSPICIOUS MINDS pressed three wide throughout and finished willingly. NELL'S BELLS was allowed to settle early, improved late while no threat. UNCAPTURED FAITH was never far back, raced inside and went evenly late. CONDUTTORE tracked four wide and tired in the lane. VOODOOISM chased the winner for six furlongs and tired in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Pharibe
ENTRY.COMMENT: was away alertly and quickly made the lead, was well handled,

RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROARING GINGER dueled early, shook clear on the turn, repulsed a bud in mid stretch under left handed urging and prevailed. UNEXPECTEDVALENTYN was well placed early, rallied in mid stretch and drew close,,could not get past the winner but held place. WEEKENDING contended throughout on the inside and finished willingly. TITEBLUEJEANS was bumped soon after the start while between horses and settled early, rallied late and improved. MISS MARY JEAN had good position early, swung four wide in the stretch and went evenly late. PUNCHCORN was no factor. GHOSTLY REVIVAL pressed four wide early and tired after a half.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 9. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GALACTIC pressed the pace throughout, edged clear late under firm handling. PLAY BALL was away alertly and dueled on the lead, shook clear in the stretch, held grudgingly and just missed. RECKLESS L J contended throughout and finished willingly three wide. PAT'S KARMA raced four wide and had a mild bid. OAKEN raced mid pack and went evenly. OHIO PLAYER was bumped at the start, rushed up down the backside, steadied on the inside at the half mile pole, contented until mid stretch and weakened late. MURRY SPUR saved ground and was no threat. KISSINGER was off slowly and was outrun. PRIVATE DRIVE had brief foot and gave way. OHIO CAUSE was outrun.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: KAT TRAX chased the early speed, rallied at the quarter pole, drew off in the stretch while being ridden out. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU ARE AWESOME set the early pace, repulsed a bid on the turn, drew clear in the stretch under firm handling. KREWE CHIEF was unhurried early, swung four wide in the stretch, finished well and was second best. BEACH FRONT had good position on the inside and needed more late. ALL STAR JUSTICE pressed the pace three wide and went evenly late. STARSHIP TAXI vied for the lead from the inside and weakened. CRAFTY CONQUEST raced three wide and lacked a late response. UNION BROTHER was no threat. GET HAMMERED contended early and was through after a half. OUT FOR JUSTICE trailed.

Non-winners Of A Race Since February 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).). ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VISUAL MISSION was allowed to settle early, rallied at the quarter pole three wide, drew off in the stretch while being ridden out to win going away. ROSCO P. COLTRANE raced four wide early, rallied on the far turn and gained the lead, was no match late for the winner but held place. STONE COLD CAT was unhurried early, rallied on the far turn and swung four wide, then went evenly late. SERVE REVENGE COLD had good position on the inside and lacked a late kick. MONSTER HUNTER was no factor. YOU'RE MY BOY BLUE set the early pace and tired in the stretch. BIG OHIO was bumped at the start, steadied and was outrun. HANSENATION contended for three quarters, then gave way.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROYAL DRAGOON was allowed to settle, rallied on the far turn and slipped through on the rail, drew clear in the stretch under mild urging.
